lenders.name: Rose & Jim
lenders.loan_because: As survivors of the devastation that poured down on our beloved city of New Orleans in August of 2005, we must continue to be aware of and grateful for the outpouring of love and help we personally received from family, friends and strangers.  From the smallest gesture of a hug to the tremendous financial help that allowed us to return to our home, we received it all in abundance.  By lending to others we can in a very small way show our gratitude for the blessings we received.

lenders.name: Merredith
lenders.loan_because: My mother's family grew up in poverty, until my grandfather was able to get an education and raise his earnings. He went to college while working full time to support his five children. Because of his hard work and sacrifices, I've had the opportunity to get a college degree of my own, and improve my life. He passed away a few years ago, and I believe that helping hard-working families to improve their lives is the best way to honor him.
lenders.occupational_info: I assist a 7th-grade teacher to help me prepare to be a teacher myself.

lenders.name: David

You never know whose life you impacted through these loans someday they may have direct impact upon the world we all live in. May God bless you all for supporting these projects.

lenders.loan_because: I've always wondered about how much my donated dollar really helps individual people.  This opportunity allows me to personalize the experience of helping someone, while encouraging them to succeed.  And also because I want my 5 kids to realize that life is not just about them, but about all of us, the people of the world, working together to make life better for everyone we come in to contact with.

I coach a variety of sports emphasizing sportsmanship, hard work, fun, creativity, teamwork and respect.  I also teach kids about all the different exercise opportunities there are, in hopes that they will find one that they like and will do on their own, so that they will be healthier throughout their life.
And I'm the big one in my picture, giving my daughter bunny ears, as Bunny is the nickname I call her.

lenders.name: Sherwin Yanzy
lenders.loan_because: Purchase film equipments like professional video camera, sound equipment, computer, and software. We have revolving dedicated volunteers who want to contribute to the industry, but we have to either rent our equipment or borrow them.  For a startup company, this leads to depreciating cash flow and disruption of work process and schedule.
lenders.occupational_info: We are revolutionizing the entertainment broadcasting industry in Singapore by developing a new breed of celebrities and production crew. We give people who aspire to contribute in the showbiz industry to enhance their skills and build their portfolio by encouraging them to create their own materials as how professionals would, then showcase them in our website. We provide a platform that suits the Singapore's busy society and culture therefore we will be able to reach a wider audience than the traditional way of broadcasting. Ultimately, we aim to improve the local entertainment scene in Singapore with more local movies, music, videos, models, actors, actresses, directors, writers, producers, etc.

lenders.name: Edmund
lenders.loan_because: The ordinary people does not require huge money to make a difference in their lives. I have been doing this and the impact is great in lives of others. I think one does not need to become millionaire before helping others to do away with poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a founder of local Non-profit organization. Micro-finance is one of the key areas of our operations. we have supported numerous people for a number of years now. I want to make positive impact in the lives of others in order to do away with generational poverty.

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: I love Jesus

lenders.name: ravi
lenders.loan_because: To help the needy.
lenders.occupational_info: Enjoyable

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: it feels good
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a factory that makes electric motor and fans.

lenders.name: Marcus
lenders.loan_because: why not?
lenders.occupational_info: social worker for people with AIDS

lenders.name: Jafafa
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: I can't work, I'm disabled. I would like to be an artist.

lenders.name: Sherry
lenders.loan_because: do what I can do for someone needs a help
lenders.occupational_info: sales

lenders.name: Sarah and Clare
lenders.loan_because: We want to help make the world a better place, and we like the idea of being able to help people on an individual level with a gift that will hopefully keep on giving.
lenders.occupational_info: tedius (paralegal for Workers' Comp) / rewarding (schoolteacher for 4 and 5 year old children)

lenders.name: the duke family
lenders.loan_because: They looked like good people to loan to.
lenders.occupational_info: We're musicians.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I think microloans are the best way to reduce poverty.  Handouts lead to dependency and large loans can lead to financial servitude.
lenders.occupational_info: Install dozens of disk drives a day for customers with large computer systems.

lenders.name: Leticia
lenders.loan_because: I was born in the U.S. but my extended family is in Central America. I feel very fortunate materially in the U.S. and want to share this with those who are motivated to improve their situations.

lenders.name: Mary Jo
lenders.loan_because: A friend gave me a gift certificate for my graduation.  It was the perfect gesture because I am an Entrepreneur who is all about empowering others.  I am thrilled to have learned about KIVA and will enjoy telling others.  I will continue to give because I have seen first hand in Peru what a difference the loans can make in a persons life and their community.  Giving a hand up instead of a hand out provides a sustainable solution for freedom from poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: Inspiring American families with information and tools for spending time around the family table.

lenders.name: Jonathan
lenders.loan_because: I'd like to help others

lenders.name: Marion
lenders.loan_because: Everybody should have the chance to improve his/her life - no matter where he/she was born.

lenders.name: Krzysztof
lenders.loan_because: to help

lenders.name: Allison
lenders.occupational_info: I am studying Economics and Poverty studies at the University of Notre Dame. I am fascinated by how economics can be applied to eliminate extreme poverty and I hope one day to work at or manage a nonprofit.

lenders.name: Lisette
lenders.loan_because: I want to give women in other parts of the world a chance that was self-evident for me as I was lucky to be born in Western Europe.

lenders.name: Brad
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of someone working to pay back a loan rather than having no accountability with a straight up donation.  I think this is the most effective form of charity.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a university student.  I'm studying agriculture.

lenders.name: Jochen
lenders.loan_because: I believe that small things can make a huge difference.

lenders.name: Clare
lenders.loan_because: I did well in my exams and my dad gave me some money, so I thought I would put it towards a good cause.

lenders.name: Katherine
lenders.loan_because: it's the right thing to do

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: I can afford to and it's the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I talk to children about their problems

lenders.name: Randy & Julie
lenders.loan_because: I am excited to be a part of other peoples success story with a helping hand while they are providing services for others.
lenders.occupational_info: We design & help others build new buildings that are energy efficient and technologically advanced.

lenders.name: Stan
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed me and I want Him to use me to help others.

lenders.name: Tho Pham
lenders.loan_because: It is real nice to help others, especially when they need it  direly.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm an ordinary person trying to go through life just like everybody else.

lenders.name: Kathy
lenders.loan_because: If I can help someone better their life, then perhaps one day they can help someone else and then it just spreads....

lenders.name: Cornelis
lenders.loan_because:
1) Everyone deserve a break, remember to share.

2) Create in business and in life A Triple Win situation

3) Farming creates within the 4 seasons, hunting kills it
lenders.occupational_info: #Farmerszen #boerenzen

lenders.name: konnsyquence.
lenders.loan_because: investing in people is the best investment of all.

lenders.name: Elias Giouvanos
lenders.loan_because: I like to help other people

lenders.name: Jonathan
lenders.loan_because: its little steps that change the world

lenders.name: Joe Mac Stevens
lenders.loan_because:
I like giving money to homeless people on the street, but I usually wonder what they are going to do with it. I've always wanted to give money to people whom I could help to make themselves better not just survive.  Kiva seems like just the way to do it.
I also have some self serving reasons for it, I am terrible at saving money this seems like a nice way to put money on the side. Its win/win.

lenders.name: Jay
lenders.loan_because: Helping others, regardless of how small or insignificant it may seem, is better than doing nothing at all.
lenders.occupational_info: I design how people interact with computer games and websites.
